previous_recap: The team has transitioned to Microsoft Suite and Janwi Bhattar has agreed to create an explainer on how to use the workspace to its fullest. Akshay Sajeev has expressed excitement about the shift and encouraged the team to promote the brand and attract new clients. A referral guideline document has been shared to help the team understand how to promote the brand. Akshay Sajeev has also prepared an outline for a demo and added it to Coda. Jijimon Chandran has inquired about the runway left, options, and user impact on option 3, and has requested to run the numbers on option 3 and fix the checkpoint bug. Additionally, Jijimon Chandran has mentioned that the team is burning through the compute budget 3x faster than projected due to the new tokenizer creating longer sequences than expected.
